> As ARURF is one of our most requested modes

I think it's important to note that URF (*not* ARURF) is one of the most requested modes (if not the most requested, which I'm willing to bet it is). ARURF itself is one of the *least* requested modes, from what I can tell.

ARURF, while not being as good as regular URF is in no way a bad mode just because you get random champs. You can still reroll and only about 5% of games are a 1 way stomp due to bad luck with champs. Maybe be grateful for what you got?

I never said it was bad, in fact I quite prefer ARURF since it forces people away from the same old "strategy" of playing the same "op" champ every single game. I was merely pointing out that ARURF is, by no means, "one of the most requested modes", as there are more people who dislike/hate it than like it.

Maybe next time you should properly consider the context of the post before making blatant assumptions.
